creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
The log4j link on the bar on the left points to http://logging.apache.org/index.html, which is the same as the main LS entry page.

That link should instead be: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/index.html

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Eliminated the log4j menu from the site navigation menu.  Didn't see a way to specify a link for a <menu> element in the site.xml schema and it seemed easier just to eliminate the nesting.
